title: Queen Suite - Renovated Furnished Studios $409.99/wk
posting_body: InTown Suites is a newly renovated, non-smoking facility right in the heart of Sandy Springs!
All of our Studio Suite rooms are offer weekly rates for a modern, clean, quiet and safe environment in the heart of Sandy Springs.
We have full-size refrigerators, 2-burner stoves, a dinette set, storage cabinets and microwaves.
We offer your own free personal phone line with unlimited domestic calls, high speed internet, and free premium cable TV channels including ShowTime.
Weekly housekeeping service is also included and we do have a 24 hour accessible on-site guest laundry facility.
We also have an on-site courtesy officer who patrols the property to make sure it stays safe after hours.
We are only 2 miles from Perimeter Mall and have easy access to I-285 and GA-400.
We are within 2 blocks of several different great places to eat
MARTA has a bus stop out in front of the property.
Call or come see us today with the hours of 11:00am-7:00pm!!
